pullrequest.title: Implement collision filtering based on collide_bitmask property

content.raw:
I agree that high performance isn’t a requirement for this setup, because this is something that should only happen occasionally; it should not be part of a regular simulation update step.

Also since the PIMPL pattern is being used here, we can implement it inefficiently to start, and then make a smarter more efficient implementation later on if someone decides it’s important.
